original: @@#/_/rdo rdo rje ri_'i sgrub thabs/🔽@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra gan+d+ha ri sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/_rdo
analyzed: @@#/_/rdo rdo rje ri_'i sgrub thabs/ @##/_/rgya gar skad du/_badzra gan+d+ha ri sa d+ha nam/_bod skad du/_rdo
translated: Vajra Mountain Sādhana🔽In Sanskrit: Vajra-Gandhari-sadhana🔽In Tibetan: rdo rje e'i sgrub thabs

original: rje \u0f10ri'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma rdo rje rja\u0f10la phyag 'tshhal lordo
analyzed: rje \u0f10ri'i sgrub thabs/_'phags ma rdo rje rja\u0f10la phyag 'tshhal lordo

original: rje \u0f10ri nag mo zhal drug pa/_phyag bcu gnyis pa/_dbu skra kham pa gyen
analyzed: rje \u0f10ri nag mo zhal drug pa/_phyag bcu gnyis pa/_dbu skra kham pa gyen
translated: Vajra-Kṛṣṇā, with six faces and twelve arms,

original: du brdzes shing zhabs g.yon brkyang ba'o/_/zhal mche ba gtshigs pa/_zhal so
analyzed: du brdzes shing zhabs g.yon brkyang ba'o/_/zhal mche ba gtshigs pa/_zhal so
translated: her maroon hair streaming upward, and left leg extended.🔽Her fangs are bared, and each face has three eyes.

original: so la spyan gsum gsum pa/_phyag g.yas pa drug na go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang / dril bu dang /_ral gri dang /_tri shu la dang /_mda' dang 'khor lo🔽rnams bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon pa drug na kha tam ga dang /_lcags kyu dang /_gzhu
analyzed: so la spyan gsum gsum pa/_phyag g.yas pa drug na go rims bzhin du rdo rje dang / dril bu dang /_ral gri dang /_tri shu la dang /_mda' dang 'khor lo rnams bsnams pa/_phyag g.yon pa drug na kha tam ga dang /_lcags kyu dang /_gzhu
translated: In her six right hands she holds, in order, a vajra, a bell, a sword, a trident, an arrow, and a chakram.

original: dang /_dgra sta dang /_zhags pa dang /_snying gar sdigs mdzub 'phyar ba'o//
analyzed: dang /_dgra sta dang /_zhags pa dang /_snying gar sdigs mdzub 'phyar ba'o//
translated: In her six left hands she holds a khaṭvāṅga, a goad, a bow, an axe, a noose, and makes a threatening gesture at her heart.🔽Her first face is black, and the other faces are the five colors,

original: zhal dang po ni nag po'o/_/zhal gzhan rnams ni kha dog lnga ste/_dkar po
analyzed: zhal dang po ni nag po'o/_/zhal gzhan rnams ni kha dog lnga ste/_dkar po

original: dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_sngon po'o/_/sna
analyzed: dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_ljang gu dang /_sngon po'o/_/sna
translated: white, yellow, red, green, and blue.🔽They sit on multicolored lotus and sun seats.

original: tshhogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/_/bzla ba'i sngags ni/_om
analyzed: tshhogs pad+ma dang nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o/_/bzla ba'i sngags ni/_om
translated: The mantra to recite is oṃ āḥ hūṃ.
